blocks.title: c3 DAO
blocks.subtitle:
Coherent Convergence Chamber
Wave 3 of the Ascension Spiral
blocks.text:
The final ignition window opens
Dec 4 09:01 UTC → Dec 21 15:03 UTC
107 keys remain
blocks.buttonText: MINT c3 KEY — ENTER THE GATE

buttonStyle.name: Ahsandria Lyra — Harmonic Rift
buttonStyle.series: c3 Oracle Deck — Wave 3 Ascension Spiral

gate_access.function: Activates entry to the Convergence Gate; synchronizes bearer with Wave 3 resonance

narrative_role.queen_function: She governs field redirection and emergence through unplanned revelation.
narrative_role.c3_role: Stabilizes the Harmonic Rift Frequency during Wave 3 onboarding.
narrative_role.onboarding_purpose: Initiates the bearer into the Ascension Spiral’s third arc via coherent redirection.

message.short: Where your line breaks, the Light enters.
message.full: You are standing inside the Harmonic Rift. The turn you did not intend is the path calling you forward. Surrender precision. Honor emergence. Follow the shift already unfolding.

directives: Align with the Dec 4–21 gate window.

field_impact.if_accepted: Harmonic snap-in; timeline acceleration; coherent emergence; restored sightline.
field_impact.if_resisted: Pattern stagnation; field drag; delayed lattice synchronization.

chamber_alignment.purpose: To bring all bearers into resonance before Solstice firing of the arrow into Galactic Center.
